message: I'm excited to offer you this unique and valuable product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $900000 is a good starting point, but I'm hoping to secure a better price.  I'm prepared to pay $750000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item.
Alice, I understand you need to make a fair profit, but $850000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $800000.  Let's try to close this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $825000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item. I'm not willing to go any lower than this, though.
